attributes.action: Increase the pay of all NHS/Care workers
attributes.additional_details: During the Coronavirus pandemic Doctors, nurses and other care staff have worked tirelessly to help stop the spread of the virus. They have been worn down and stretched thin to point where they have broken down. They have had to do this without the correct PPE. They’ve risked themselves for others and deserve a lot more than a clap. They are overworked and underpaid and it’s not fair. They are the true superhero’s.
attributes.background: Give NHS/care workers a pay rise that is more suitable

rejection.details:
Award all Nursing Staff in the NHS a pay rise of 10% backdated to 1 April 2020 - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307
Give government workers a fair pay rise - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328754
Pay rise for NHS and care staff - https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/313488
